attributes.action: Open up closed army barracks for use by homeless ex servicemen
attributes.additional_details: More must be done to alleviate the plight of homeless ex servicemen.
attributes.background: In light of the utilisation of the closed barracks in Folkestone to house illegal immigrants why can this facility not be extended to assist homeless ex servicemen.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551451
